content.description:
This is a phenomenal line that climbs like a gym route. Perfect, incut crimps, bad feet, and long moves describe this problem.

Start sitting on the far left arete with a poor left hand sidepull and a better right hand edge with a kneebar. Move right following incut crimps to join the stand, then keep it together on the airy finish over the spectacular, built landing.
content.protection: A few pads. There is a nice, flat landing due to some amazing log construction.
content.location: On Behemoth 2, start on the right arete, and climb the awesome and steep face rightwards.

content.description:
This looks short but climbs incredibly well with a spooky mantel. Start sitting with the good left hand sidepull and a sloping slot for your right hand. Head up and right over the lip to a very committing mantel.

Video beta:

https://youtu.be/XUBqGeGiS9c

.
content.location:
It is about 20 feet up and left of

Goodbye to Romance

.
